Best pizza in a 30 mile radius.  Not greasy at all. Dough has flavor and texture. Great balance of sauce, cheese, and spices. Seriously, I haven't had such good pizza in years. Bonus: you don't feel gross after it. Its almost like if a Neapolitan and Bronx pizzas had a baby.
